data.name: CalandarBookingCreation
data.value: The manager of {0} added your booking for a(n) {1} from {2} to {3} on his eWorky's schedule. You can consult this booking from now on your user space {4}. The cost of this booking is {5}, we also invite you to pay online via Paypal. for your next booking do not hesitate, use directly eWorky for your convenience! If this space satisfied you, do not hesitate to rate and comment it on its eWorky form {6}.

data.name: CalandarBookingModification

For your next booking, do not hesitate, use directly eWorky for your convenience ! If this space satisfied you, do not hesitate to rate and comment it on its eWorky form {4}.
